admin/cybersource.title: Cybersource

admin/cybersource.settings.isLive.label: Production mode
admin/cybersource.settings.salesChannelE: Sales Channels to Exclude from Cybersource.
admin/cybersource.settings.isLive.helpTe: Disable this toggle if using a sandbox API key.
admin/cybersource.settings.salesChannelE: Comma separated list of sales channel ids to exclude.
admin/cybersource.settings.readmeContent: • You can set merchant defined fields on this page. With every line in the text area, you can input a new custom merchant defined field. See application read me for further instructions.
admin/cybersource.settings.readmeInstruc: • Any values outside of the curly brackets will be taken at direct value while any values between the curly brackets must be in the following format: Reference Word|Modification Word|Values
